summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of test‑time augmentation utilities, checking correct processing of images without labels, handling of single and multiple transforms, and ensuring appropriate warnings are emitted for non‑random or non‑invertible transformations.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of test‑time data augmentation components in a computer‑vision library, preventing regressions and providing clear feedback to developers when unsupported transform configurations are used.
